(* 																	
Author: Pieter van Baal, february 2005																	
Costs per disease per year per year as estimated using  Costs of Illness 1999 in the Netherlands data																	
In CZM Technical Report no.9 it is described how costs per patient per disease per year were estimated using																	
More details about costs and economic evaluations with the CZM can be found in RIVM Report 260706002: Cost Effectiveness Analysis with the CZM																	
*)																	

Div: 1
